function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)

	if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(T_VILLAGERS[idActorKilled]) then
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(T_VILLAGERS[idActorKilled], 25)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(T_VILLAGERS[idActorKilled], T_NPC_DEATH_FX[Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_NPC_DEATH_FX)])
		Hydra.ActorKill(T_VILLAGERS[idActorKilled], "Death_Crushed")
	end


end

function Start()
	if isWagonsAlive() then
		local idVillager = getRandomAliveVillager()
		Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(CONV_VICTORY, idVillager)

		playVillagerAnimAndIdle(S_KEY_UNHIDE)
		playVillagerAnimAndIdle(S_KEY_GETUP)
		playRandomVillagerEndPower()
	end
	
	local sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD

	if Hydra.QuestGetBonusPhaseResult() then
		sChest = ACTOR_CHEST_REWARD_HEROIC
	end
	
	Events.SpawnRewardChest(CHEST_LOCATION, sChest)
end

unk_c47e01a:
local function getAliveVillagers()
	local tAliveVillagers = {}
	for i, idNPC in pairs(T_VILLAGERS) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idNPC) then
			table.insert(tAliveVillagers, idNPC)
		end
	end
	return tAliveVillagers
end

local function isWagonsAlive()
	return #getAliveVillagers() > 0
end

local function getRandomAliveVillager()
	local tAliveVillagers = getAliveVillagers()
	local nVillagerCount = #tAliveVillagers
	if nVillagerCount > 1 then
		return tAliveVillagers[Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, nVillagerCount)]
	elseif nVillagerCount > 0 then
		return tAliveVillagers[1]
	else
		return Hydra.ACDID_INVALID
	end
end

local function wagonAttacked(idActor)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(CONV_NPC_ATTACKED, T_VILLAGERS[idActor])
end

local function playYell(t) -- like a deck of cards we play the yell and remove that actor from the 'deck' so it can't play the effect again
	local nRand = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #t)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(t[nRand], SFX_WARNING)
	table.remove(t, nRand)
	return t
end

local function playPlayerVoiceLine(sConv) -- gets nearby participants and plays a conversation on the primary player
	local tPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
	for i, idPlayer in pairs(tPlayers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) and Hydra.ActorDistanceBetweenActors(ID_THIS_QUEST, idPlayer, true) <= N_RANGE_QUEST and Hydra.PlayerIsPrimary(idPlayer) then   
			Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(sConv, idPlayer)
		end
	end
end

local function playVillagerAnimAndIdle(sKey)
	for i, idVillager in pairs(getAliveVillagers()) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVillager) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVillager) then
			Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idVillager, T_TARGETABLE[sKey])
			Hydra.QActorWait(idVillager, Hydra.GetRandomFloat())
			if (sKey == S_KEY_GETUP) then
				Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idVillager, T_INTRO_ANIMKEYS[sKey], T_END_ANIMKEYS[Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_END_ANIMKEYS)])
			else
				Hydra.QActorAnimAndNewIdle(idVillager, T_INTRO_ANIMKEYS[sKey], T_IDLE_ANIMKEYS[sKey])
			end
		end
	end
end

local function playRandomVillagerEndPower()
	for i, idVillager in pairs(getAliveVillagers()) do
		-- Get a random string from the table to determin what the npc should do, and remove the item from the table
		-- table has 2 of each string so all 3 npcs won't ever be doing the same thing
		local npcAction = table.remove(T_NPC_END_ACTIONS, Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_NPC_END_ACTIONS))
		if (npcAction == "cry")then
			local cTarget = T_CORPSES[Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_CORPSES)]
			Hydra.QActorPower(idVillager, "AI_MoveTo", cTarget)
			Hydra.QActorPower(idVillager, "LE_Ambush_NPC_Cry", cTarget)
		elseif (npcAction == "pray")then
			local cTarget = T_CORPSES[Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_CORPSES)]
			Hydra.QActorPower(idVillager, "AI_MoveTo", cTarget)
			Hydra.QActorPower(idVillager, "LE_Ambush_NPC_Pray", cTarget)
		end
	end
end
unk_993f312:
-- ======= REFERENCES =======	
	S_KEY_HIDE = "hide"
	S_KEY_UNHIDE = "unhide"
	S_KEY_GETUP = "getup"
	
	T_TARGETABLE = {}
	T_TARGETABLE[S_KEY_HIDE] = false
	T_TARGETABLE[S_KEY_UNHIDE] = true
	T_TARGETABLE[S_KEY_GETUP] = true
	
	T_INTRO_ANIMKEYS = {}
	T_INTRO_ANIMKEYS[S_KEY_HIDE] = Hydra.ReferencePower("AnimKey_OnChest_Hide_Intro")
	T_INTRO_ANIMKEYS[S_KEY_UNHIDE] = Hydra.ReferencePower("AnimKey_OnChest_Hide_Outro")
	T_INTRO_ANIMKEYS[S_KEY_GETUP] = Hydra.ReferencePower("AnimKey_OnChest_Getup")

	T_IDLE_ANIMKEYS = {}
	T_IDLE_ANIMKEYS[S_KEY_HIDE] = Hydra.ReferencePower("AnimKey_OnChest_Hide_Idle")
	T_IDLE_ANIMKEYS[S_KEY_UNHIDE] = Hydra.ReferencePower("AnimKey_Neutral")
	
	-- making getup idle anim a random wounded anim
	T_END_ANIMKEYS = {"AnimKey_Wounded_Standing_Idle", "AnimKey_Wounded_Standing_Idle_Arm", "AnimKey_Idle_Sad"}
	T_IDLE_ANIMKEYS[S_KEY_GETUP] = Hydra.ReferencePower(T_END_ANIMKEYS[Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, #T_END_ANIMKEYS)])
	
	T_NPC_END_ACTIONS = {"idle", "idle", "cry", "cry", "pray", "pray"}
	
	T_NPC_DEATH_FX = {"fxKit_blood_splash_a", "fxKit_blood_splash_b", "fxKit_blood_splash_c", "fxKit_blood_spurt_b"}
		
-- ======= VARIABLES =======
--	Constants
	ID_THIS_QUEST = Hydra.QuestGetOwner()
	N_RANGE_QUEST = 16
	
	--initialize wagon data structures
	T_VILLAGERS = {}
	
	for i, idWagon in pairs(T_WAGONS) do
		T_VILLAGERS[idWagon] = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idWagon, "NPC")[1]
	end
	
	playVillagerAnimAndIdle(S_KEY_HIDE)
	
	for i = 1, #T_CORPSES do
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(T_CORPSES[i], true)
	end 
	

	
	FYShuffle(T_WAGONS)
	
--	local nWagonsToDisable = -- world tier implementation

--		Hydra.ActorDelete(T_VILLAGERS[idWagon])

	-- Very between 2-3 wagons that the player needs to defend
--	for i = 1, 2 do
--	local idWagon = T_WAGONS[1]
--	Hydra.ActorsEnableLinkedByActorInGroup(idWagon, "destroyedWagon")
--	Hydra.ActorDelete(idWagon)
--	Hydra.ActorDelete(T_VILLAGERS[idWagon])
--	end
	
	T_WAGONS = Hydra.ActorsInPrefabScopedGroup("LE_Ambush_Wagons")
	
	for i, wagonID in pairs(T_WAGONS) do -- clean up extra stuff, need this to get rid of encounter corpses that are always spawned in
		for i, linkedID in pairs(Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(wagonID, "destroyedWagon")) do
			Hydra.ActorDelete(linkedID)
		end
	end
